patient_info: Abnormality of refraction,Visual loss,Cafe-au-lait spot,Cranial hyperostosis,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Abnormal shape of the occiput
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. Hyperparathyroidism: Abnormality of refraction, calcium deposition in bone, calcium deposition on skin and irregular margins of lesions could suggest this condition.
2. Marfan syndrome: Refractive errors, visual loss, and cranial hyperostosis could be associated with this condition.
3. Ehlers Danlos syndrome (EDS): Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia, abnormality of the occiput, and abdominal pain could point towards this condition.
4. Fibrous Dysplasia of the Occipital Bone: Abnormal shape of the occiput and cranial hyperostosis could be characteristic of this condition.
5. Osteogenesis Imperfecta (OI): Refractive errors, abnormality of the occiput and cranial hyperostosis could be observed in this condition.
6. Radiation Therapy-Induced Bone Changes: Abnormal refractive errors, calcium deposition on skin, and irregular margins of lesions could suggest this condition.
7. Polylipemia: Visual loss, abdominal pain and hypocholesterolemia.
8. Hypocalcemia: Cranial hyperostosis, irregular shape of the occiput, and refractive errors.
9. Blepharitis: Anisocoria, visual loss, and eyelid symptoms could point towards this condition.
10. Non-Syndromic Cranial Hyperostosis: Abnormal shape of the occiput and cranial hyperostosis could be observed in this condition.
